section.title: Repository
section.para: Suse uses an "yum" based repository system. From the command line it used "zypper".

In order to add the Eclipse NeoSCADA repository to your system execute the following commands as root.
zypper addrepo -G http://download.eclipse.org/eclipsescada/repos/release/0.3/yum/ eclipsescada zypper refresh
You can verify that the repository was added using the following command: zypper search "org.eclipse.scada*" There should be at least one package found by this command.
